name: Google Docs Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Docs Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Docs API.

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Docs API. | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: document

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

driveId.name: driveId
driveId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
driveId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Drive Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 默认值: myDrive | (必填项)

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

documentURL.name: documentURL
documentURL.description: The ID in the document URL (or just paste the whole URL)
documentURL.natural_language_description: 参数名: Doc ID or URL | 作用: The ID in the document URL (or just paste the whole URL) | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

actionsUi.name: actionsUi
actionsUi.description: Actions applied to update the document
actionsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Actions | 作用: Actions applied to update the document | 默认值: {'actionFields': [{'object': 'text', 'action': 'insert', 'locationChoice': 'endOfSegmentLocation', 'index': 0, 'text': ''}]}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
